patthana9.7:4.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.7:4.2: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.7:4.3: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.7:5.1: Naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.7:6.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalañca naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.7:8.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.7:10.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
